title: Mexico : housing prices 2018 to 2019
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Price in thousand Mexican pesos in each Quarter on the y axis.
The maximum Price in thousand Mexican pesos 1071.24 is found at Quarter Q1 2019 and the minimum is found at Q3 2018 where Quarter is 800.98.
The difference of Price in thousand Mexican pesos between the highest and lowest Quarter is 270.26.
min_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Price in thousand Mexican pesos in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Price in thousand Mexican pesos is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q1 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q3 2018.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Price in thousand Mexican pesos in each Quarter on the y axis.
The maximum Price in thousand Mexican pesos 1071.24 is found at Quarter Q1 2019 and the minimum is found at Q3 2018 where Quarter is 800.98.
The difference of Price in thousand Mexican pesos between the highest and lowest Quarter is 270.26.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Price in thousand Mexican pesos for 6 number of Quarters.
The maximum Price in thousand Mexican pesos 1071.24 is found at Quarter Q1 2019 and the minimum is found at Q3 2018 where Quarter is 800.98.
The difference of Price in thousand Mexican pesos between the highest and lowest Quarter is 270.26.
The Quarter Q1 2019 has the highest Price in thousand Mexican pesos, followed by Q2 2019, and Q2 2018. Down to the Quarter Q3 2018 which is the lowest.
Over the past 6 Quarters, the Price in thousand Mexican pesos has decreased.
The average Price in thousand Mexican pesos in all 6 Quarters is 895.62.
Summing up the values of all Quarters, we get total 5373.75.
